bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Greeting card from Estela Agramonte Rodriguez Leon, December 22, 1942

div1.p: Rodriguez Leon thanks Hench for the reprints he sent and promises to write soon. She hopes that she can answer some of Hench's questions about the yellow fever experiments.

div1.head: Greeting card from Estela Agramonte Rodriguez Leon, December 22, 1942
div1.p:
Thank you very much
for the reprints. I have alrea-
dy distributed quite a few
to people whom I knew
they would interest. I hope
to write soon, and then have
something to tell about the
various points you wished
to clear up in Y. Fever

My husband joins me
in wishing you and Mrs. Hench
the best of Xmas' & New Year's.
div1.closer:
Cordially, E. A. R. Muchas Felicidades
en las el Año venidero
Estela Agramonte de Rodríguez León
